channel.title: euclidean on Emiel Hoogeboom
channel.description: Recent content in euclidean on Emiel Hoogeboom

item.title: How to build E(n) Equivariant Normalizing Flows?
item.description: How to build E(n) Equivariant Normalizing Flows from our recent paper? We will discuss 1) Normalizing Flows 2) Continuous Time Normalizing Flows 3) E(n) GNNs, 4) Argmax Flows. Finally we talk about our 5) E(n) Flows. Most of these topics are tangential: if you don’t care, just read the intuition and skip it :)
